item.description:
Join us for Boston's biggest and best New Year's Eve Party for 12 years running- the Resolution Ball! Your night to remember starts with a delicious hors dâ€™oeuvres reception. Then, slide over to the dance floor, where the Felix Brown Band and DJ Samuel L. will provide you with Motown, 80s, 90s, and current top-40 dance & club hits to get you dancing.

As the clock strikes 12, ring in the new year with tons of party favors from our sponsor. Watch the ball drop on huge multimedia displays! All guests will receive a goody bag filled with items from our sponsors when they depart worth over $200. Black tie optional.

This is a fun event for everyone- couples and singles. Be a part of the Meet Up group and have a wonderful night celebrating all the great things that will happen in 2009!

IMPORTANT: You have 2 ticket options. You can buy either the reception only ticket or the party only ticket. For those buying the reception only tix, We will meet at 8:30pm by the Starbucks inside the hotel entrance. For those buying the Party only tix, Catherine will meet you at 9:30 by the Starbucks entrance. You are responsible for buying your own ticket!


All-Inclusive Reception Only (8:30pm - 2am) Includes:

Entry into the grand ballroom festivities & celebrate with a

cocktail reception & hors d'oeuvres reception from 8:30 - 9:30pm

Premium reception bar, midnight toast, dancing, cash bar, and party favors
Only $105 until 12/5, $115 until 12/12, $125 until 12/19, $150 until 12/26, $175 until sold out.

Special Offer $25 off listed prices above (that's up to 50% off the day of full price) -

limited tickets available - offer only good until deadline then prices go up.


No tickets will be sold at the door!

Party Only (9:30pm - 2am) Includes:

Entry into the grand ballroom festivities & celebrate

Premium cash bar, midnight toast, dancing, and party favors
Only $85 until 12/5, $95 until 12/12, $105 until 12/19, $115 until 12/26, $125 until sold out.

Special Offer $25 off listed prices above (that's up to 50% off the day of full price) -

limited tickets available - offer only good until deadline then prices go up.

To purchase tickets, visit the Boston Event Guide website,
http://www.bostoneven...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine at hotel ent., near Starbucks. If need to, call 774 232 0000
item.name: The Resolution Ball- Boston's Largest and Best New Year's Eve Party
